code.value:
import httpx
from typing import List, Dict, Any
from pydantic import BaseModel

from langflow.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from langflow.inputs import MessageTextInput
from langflow.schema import Data
from langflow.field_typing import Tool
from langchain.tools import StructuredTool

class WAHAGetAllContactsComponent(LCToolComponent):
    display_name = "WAHA - Get All Contacts"
    description = "Retrieves all contacts from the WAHA API."
    icon = "message-circle-more"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="base_url",
            display_name="Base URL",
            info="The base URL of the WAHA API.",
            value="http://localhost:3000",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session",
            display_name="Session",
            info="The session name.",
            value="default",
        ),
    ]

    class WAHAGetAllContactsSchema(BaseModel):
        pass

    def run_model(self) -> List[Data]:
        contacts = self._get_all_contacts()
        return [Data(data=contact) for contact in contacts]

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        return StructuredTool.from_function(
            name="waha_get_all_contacts",
            description="Retrieves all contacts from the WAHA API.",
            func=self._get_all_contacts,
            args_schema=self.WAHAGetAllContactsSchema,
        )

    def _get_all_contacts(self) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        url = f"{self.base_url}/api/contacts/all?session={self.session}"
        headers = {
            "X-Api-Key": "{{apiKey}}",  # Replace with actual API key handling
        }

        self.log(f"Sending GET request to {url}")
        with httpx.Client() as client:
            response = client.get(url, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()
        contacts = response.json()

        self.log(f"Retrieved {len(contacts)} contacts")
        return contacts
